titleStmt.title: The Quakers vvisdom descendeth not from above or a brief vindication of a small tract, intituled, The Quakers folly made manifest to all men, as also of its authour, from the exceptions made against it, and aspersions cast upon him. In a pamphlet called The voice of wisdom, &c. published by George Whithead, Quaker. / By Tho. Danson, M.A. late fellow of Magd. Coll. Oxon. And now minister of the Gospel at Sandwich in Kent.
titleStmt.author: Danson, Thomas, d. 1694.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. Allen, at the Rising Sun in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: "A narrative" has separate caption title and pagination; register is continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Rising Sun in Pauls Church-yard
